mdRecord.dcterms:title: Criminal Warrants, Justice of the Peace: Commonwealth vs Thomas Childress
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Commonwealth vs Thomas Childress Offense: Assault and battery by striking and beating him Victim: James F. Marten Complainant: James F. Marten and A.J. Lee Recorded in Floyd County Courthouse 04.12.1887 Costs: $3.00 fine and $2.00 court cost Guilty
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Court Records
Warrants (Law)
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: The Circuit Court of Floyd County
